title: Can this laptop run League of Legends?
body:
Processor: 7th Generation Intel Dual Core i5-7200U Processor 2.5GHz up to 3.1GHz 3MB L3 cache
Memory: 8GB DDR4 SDRAM (1 DIMM)
Video graphics: Intel HD Graphics 620
Hard drive: 1TB 5400RPM Serial ATA hard drive
Finish: HP finish in smoke gray with woven texture and ash silver in the strat pattern
Optical drive: DVD-Writer
Display: 15.6-inch diagonal HD SVA BrightView WLED-backlit (1366x768)
Network card: Integrated 10/100/1000 GbE LAN
Wireless LAN: 1x1 802.11ac WLAN and Bluetooth
Digital Card Reader: Multi-format digital media card reader
Ports: 2x USB 3.1 Gen 1 (Data Transfer Only) / 1x USB 2.0 / 1x HDMI / 1x RJ-45 / 1x Headphone-out/microphone-in combo jack
Power: 45 Watt AC adapter

Can somebody predict my fps and how well League of Legends will run on this type of computer? Yes I just copied and pasted the item desc. Thanks

replies.body: let me put it this way, with a worse off processor and a better gpu i get roughly 250fps. you should hit around 150 given that integrated crap. ram is usually a non issue and as far as everything below your hard drive, all irrelevent. for the future, this game recommends a gpu that was released 11 years ago in about 3 weeks. for games, just look at GPU CPU RAM and, if needed, HD space. if you arent sure about where your GPU/CPU sits based on the recommended for any game use this website: [http://gpu.userbenchmark.com/](http://gpu.userbenchmark.com)

I can't really recommend specifics for you, the choices are totally up to you.  What I can recommend, though, is our [recommended specs guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements).  This should help pick the right rig for you!
